meanings.definition: To make a mistake or error.
meanings.sent1: I was woopsing when I accidentally deleted the important file.
meanings.sent2: She always ends up woopsing when she tries to bake a cake.
meanings.sent3: While woopsing, he tripped over his own shoelaces.
meanings.sent4: The comedian woopsed during his stand-up routine, making the audience laugh.
meanings.sent5: The student's constant woopsing in math class led to low grades.

meanings.definition: An exclamation used to express surprise or dismay.
meanings.sent1: Woopsing! I dropped my phone on the floor.
meanings.sent2: She exclaimed 'Woopsing!' when she realized she forgot her keys.
meanings.sent3: Woopsing, I forgot to turn off the stove before leaving the house.
meanings.sent4: The loud 'Woopsing!' from the kitchen startled the cat.
meanings.sent5: Woopsing! I almost spilled my drink all over the table.
